issue.title: tcdn.com.br
issue.body:

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://x.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fx.com%2FPETEandrepete_%2Fstatus%2F1788379241815445981) ### Comment > I use the app “Downie” https://software.charliemonroe.net/downie/ to download audio, video, and images from various websites. One such was of starting a download is to paste the URL of a page that contains the item you want to download. > > This works 100% of the time for everything EXCEPT Twitter. Excuse me, X.com. > > So say I want to download this gif of a tornado that I just tweeted. The URL is https://x.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981 and pasting this directly into Downie will cause an error "Error: Cannot find configuration URL.” > > If the URL is simply changed to https://twitter.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981 then it downloads perfectly. > > This ONLY happens when AdGuard is running. Disable it and you can now use either x.com or twitter.com URLs. > > A while back I THOUGHT i had nailed this down as being related to DNS Protection, which i had been using at the time. Seems like when I changed it or disabled it the problem went away, however that is not the case as of now. So the only workaround is to change the URL manually. Username: `@petekjohnson` ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://x.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fx.com%2FPETEandrepete_%2Fstatus%2F1788379241815445981) ### Comment > I use the app “Downie” https://software.charliemonroe.net/downie/ to download audio, video, and images from various websites. One such was of starting a download is to paste the URL of a page that contains the item you want to download. > > This works 100% of the time for everything EXCEPT Twitter. Excuse me, X.com. > > So say I want to download this gif of a tornado that I just tweeted. The URL is https://x.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981 and pasting this directly into Downie will cause an error "Error: Cannot find configuration URL.” > > If the URL is simply changed to https://twitter.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981 then it downloads perfectly. > > This ONLY happens when AdGuard is running. Disable it and you can now use either x.com or twitter.com URLs. > > A while back I THOUGHT i had nailed this down as being related to DNS Protection, which i had been using at the time. Seems like when I changed it or disabled it the problem went away, however that is not the case as of now. So the only workaround is to change the URL manually. Username: `@petekjohnson` ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://x.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fx.com%2FPETEandrepete_%2Fstatus%2F1788379241815445981) ### Comment > I use the app “Downie” https://software.charliemonroe.net/downie/ to download audio, video, and images from various websites. One such was of starting a download is to paste the URL of a page that contains the item you want to download. > > This works 100% of the time for everything EXCEPT Twitter. Excuse me, X.com. > > So say I want to download this gif of a tornado that I just tweeted. The URL is https://x.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981 and pasting this directly into Downie will cause an error "Error: Cannot find configuration URL.” > > If the URL is simply changed to https://twitter.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981 then it downloads perfectly. > > This ONLY happens when AdGuard is running. Disable it and you can now use either x.com or twitter.com URLs. > > A while back I THOUGHT i had nailed this down as being related to DNS Protection, which i had been using at the time. Seems like when I changed it or disabled it the problem went away, however that is not the case as of now. So the only workaround is to change the URL manually. Username: `@petekjohnson` ### Screenshots

One such was of starting a download is to paste the URL of a page that contains the item you want to download. > > This works 100% of the time for everything EXCEPT Twitter. Excuse me, X.com. > > So say I want to download this gif of a tornado that I just tweeted. The URL is https://x.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981 and pasting this directly into Downie will cause an error "Error: Cannot find configuration URL.” > > If the URL is simply changed to https://twitter.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981 then it downloads perfectly. > > This ONLY happens when AdGuard is running. Disable it and you can now use either x.com or twitter.com URLs. > > A while back I THOUGHT i had nailed this down as being related to DNS Protection, which i had been using at the time. Seems like when I changed it or disabled it the problem went away, however that is not the case as of now. So the only workaround is to change the URL manually. Username: `@petekjohnson` ### Screenshots

issue.title: novinky.cz - cookie popup
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

If you visit novinky.cz, popup saying "Abyste mohli pokračovat, potřebujeme vědět, jakou formou vám můžeme zobrazovat reklamu" (translated "In order for you to proceed, we need to know how we can show you advertising") will appear shortly after visiting the website.

### Proposed solution

I made filter for this (but it needs more testing, not sure, if it breaks something, it didn't break anything for me, but we cannot be 100% sure)
```
||cmp.seznam.cz^$3p
```

### Additional information

This is also related to #177571

comment.body:
> Maybe the visitor will encounter [#178995 (comment)](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/178995#issuecomment-2105683410).

It seems to be a hit-or-miss. Sometimes I get redirected, sometimes not.

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. > I can reproduce. Blocking https://st.chatango.com/js/gz/emb.js removes popups.

What popup and how Chatango widget script can cause popup?

> 
> You would have to add two rules:
> 
> ```
> /olrod?id*$script,third-party
> ```

This part is not stable and will become useless soon. This is why I [opened](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/pull/179486) a PR. I guess this can cause the popup, but can't reproduce. Will add to EL as adserver later with other revolving servers.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: Fix to Deadline/TVLine overlay no longer works
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.5.3 (1016)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://deadline.com/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I created this issue a while back. The fix no longer works and I can’t re-open previous issue: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/177137
2. The last checkbox at the top of this form is untrue. Why is it required to be checked? Disabling AdGuard has no effect on this issue other than causing all the ads to appear.
3. This affects 2 sister sites and most likely all sites under the PMC.
4. The overlay does not appear on every page, it seems to appear every 3 or 4 page refreshes/navigations.

5. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![IMG_3239](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/64618797/ea65c019-0be2-4514-a896-c1d0d4129e50)


</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

![IMG_3240](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/64618797/d6d9a635-2419-486c-9e03-f71519b018e7)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: Fix to Deadline/TVLine overlay no longer works
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.5.3 (1016)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://deadline.com/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I created this issue a while back. The fix no longer works and I can’t re-open previous issue: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/177137
2. The last checkbox at the top of this form is untrue. Why is it required to be checked? Disabling AdGuard has no effect on this issue other than causing all the ads to appear.
3. This affects 2 sister sites and most likely all sites under the PMC.
4. The overlay does not appear on every page, it seems to appear every 3 or 4 page refreshes/navigations.

5. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![IMG_3239](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/64618797/ea65c019-0be2-4514-a896-c1d0d4129e50)


</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

![IMG_3240](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/64618797/d6d9a635-2419-486c-9e03-f71519b018e7)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Please enable Annoyances filter and ensure it is update.

Функция "блокировать рекламу на сайте" и ручная блокировка элементов помогает до первого обновления страницы. Сайт не находится в "исключениях". Возможно, это произошло после отключения на один вечер в трее приложения на Windows (в целях экономии батареи на ноутбуке) (но браузерная версия не была отключена). На других сайтах всё работает в штатном режиме. Переустановка приложения и расширения с перезагрузками не дало нужного эффекта. Username: `@KotWRF` ### Screenshots

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

### ATTENTION

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.5.3 (1016)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://deadline.com/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I created this issue a while back. The fix no longer works and I can’t re-open previous issue: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/177137
2. The last checkbox at the top of this form is untrue. Why is it required to be checked? Disabling AdGuard has no effect on this issue other than causing all the ads to appear.
3. This affects 2 sister sites and most likely all sites under the PMC.
4. The overlay does not appear on every page, it seems to appear every 3 or 4 page refreshes/navigations.

5. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![IMG_3239](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/64618797/ea65c019-0be2-4514-a896-c1d0d4129e50)


</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

![IMG_3240](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/64618797/d6d9a635-2419-486c-9e03-f71519b018e7)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.5.3 (1016)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://deadline.com/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I created this issue a while back. The fix no longer works and I can’t re-open previous issue: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/177137
2. The last checkbox at the top of this form is untrue. Why is it required to be checked? Disabling AdGuard has no effect on this issue other than causing all the ads to appear.
3. This affects 2 sister sites and most likely all sites under the PMC.
4. The overlay does not appear on every page, it seems to appear every 3 or 4 page refreshes/navigations.

5. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![IMG_3239](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/64618797/ea65c019-0be2-4514-a896-c1d0d4129e50)


</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

![IMG_3240](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/64618797/d6d9a635-2419-486c-9e03-f71519b018e7)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Your posted config is incomplete then. Cannot reproduce, but blocked another of their domains and added another url they check to whitelist. Please check for updates in about 3-4 hours.

comment.body:

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.5.3 (1016)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://deadline.com/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I created this issue a while back. The fix no longer works and I can’t re-open previous issue: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/177137
2. The last checkbox at the top of this form is untrue. Why is it required to be checked? Disabling AdGuard has no effect on this issue other than causing all the ads to appear.
3. This affects 2 sister sites and most likely all sites under the PMC.
4. The overlay does not appear on every page, it seems to appear every 3 or 4 page refreshes/navigations.

5. Screenshots

</details>

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Your filter screenshot is enough. It takes a while until the rules are available in filter updates (usually 3-4 hours after a commit). So best to check for updates manually after this time.

One such was of starting a download is to paste the URL of a page that contains the item you want to download. > > This works 100% of the time for everything EXCEPT Twitter. Excuse me, X.com. > > So say I want to download this gif of a tornado that I just tweeted. The URL is https://x.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981 and pasting this directly into Downie will cause an error "Error: Cannot find configuration URL.” > > If the URL is simply changed to https://twitter.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981 then it downloads perfectly. > > This ONLY happens when AdGuard is running. Disable it and you can now use either x.com or twitter.com URLs. > > A while back I THOUGHT i had nailed this down as being related to DNS Protection, which i had been using at the time. Seems like when I changed it or disabled it the problem went away, however that is not the case as of now. So the only workaround is to change the URL manually.
